Useful Tips for Divine Smite in BG3

Upon reaching level 5, Divine Smite will deal 3d8 radiant damage to your target on top of your weapon's damage. You will also get two more rows under the Reactions tab and this time, giving you control over up-casting Divine Smite as a level 2 spell. It is recommended that you turn everything on and have all the "Ask" boxes in each row checked, this way, it will give you full control over this spell's use.
